trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Plymouth
There were no other sightings in Plymouth on or around July 1st 2012
divs: sighting detailswhile walking to turkey hill convenience store, noticed an unusual orb of brilliant, orange reddish glow flying directly towards the west. there was firework activity going on in the neighbor hoods but this resembled an aerial flare, countermeasure. it was quite appareant this was incorrect as it only continued to fly without loss of altitude. abruptly changed direction and ascended until it disappeared. during my observation approximately 5 to 6 others noticed my attention to the sky and the object and questioned what it was. various theories were it was a sky lantern or such, but the object was significantly larger and moved quickly and changed direction until ascending out of sight. the sky was clear, 3\4 moon in full view as well as other small aircraft visible. this is the second time in a year i have witnessed a similar object same characteristics of flight and rapid ascension. one other witness was present at the first event.
Summary: orange red orb in east west flight path, the changed to south and ascended rapidly and disappeared.
